body.p: This guide will walk you through the process of registering a Helion Public Cloud account, downloading the ALS management tool and the ALS client, creating your sandbox environment, and deploying your first cluster. After deploying your cluster, you will be able to push sample applications and troubleshoot or terminate your instance and its security groups as necessary.
body.note: You can use this guide to try out the HPE Helion Development Platform and to learn about its operation. You must not use your sandbox environment as a production system.
